name: Hemodialysis
title: Hemodialysis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for hemodialysis.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent hemodialysis.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
